Reference

All functions

add_zeros()

Add records with value zero for missing variable combinations in a given dataset

calc_deadw_decay_plot()

aggregate parameters by decay stage, plot and year

calc_deadw_decay_plot_species()

aggregate parameters by decay stage, plot, tree species and year

calc_dendro_plot()

aggregate parameters by plot and year

calc_dendro_plot_species()

aggregate parameters by plot and tree species

calc_diam_plot()

aggregate parameters by diameter class, plot and year

calc_diam_plot_species()

aggregate parameters by diameter class, plot, tree species and year

calc_diam_statistics_species()

Give diameter statistics by forest reserve, species and year

calc_intact_deadwood()

Calculate bole and crown volume of intact deadwood

calc_reg_core_area_height_spec()

aggregate regeneration parameters by plot, height, species and year

calc_reg_core_area_species()

aggregate regeneration parameters by plot, species and year

calc_reg_plot()

calculate species number by plot and year

calc_reg_plot_height()

calculate species number by plot, tree height class and year

calc_reg_plot_height_species()

aggregate parameters by plot, tree height class, species and year

calc_reg_plot_species()

calculate regeneration parameters by plot, species and year

calc_variables_stem_level()

Calculate additional variables on stem level

calc_variables_tree_level()

Calculate additional variables on tree level

calc_veg_core_area_species()

aggregate vegetation parameters by core area, species and year

calc_veg_plot()

aggregate vegetation parameters by plot and year

calculate_dendrometry()

Calculates and aggregates parameters on dendrometry of trees

calculate_regeneration()

aggregates parameters on regeneration of trees

calculate_vegetation()

aggregates parameters on vegetation of forests

check_data_deadwood()

check table Deadwood from Fieldmap database for inconsistencies

check_data_fmdb()

check tables from Fieldmap database for inconsistencies

check_data_herblayer()

check table Herblayer from Fieldmap database for inconsistencies

check_data_plotdetails()

check table Plotdetails from Fieldmap database for inconsistencies

check_data_plots()

check table Plots from Fieldmap database for inconsistencies

check_data_regeneration()

check table Regeneration from Fieldmap database for inconsistencies

check_data_regspecies()

check table RegSpecies from Fieldmap database for inconsistencies

check_data_shoots()

check table Shoots from Fieldmap database for inconsistencies

check_data_trees()

check table Trees from Fieldmap database for inconsistencies

check_data_vegetation()

check table Vegetation from Fieldmap database for inconsistencies

check_trees_evolution()

check table Trees from Fieldmap database for inconsistencies between periods

compare_periods_per_plot()

compare parameters between periods (years that parameters are measured)

compose_stem_data()

Combine dendro data and shoot data to give detailed stem data

create_statistics()

Calculate statistics for the given dataset

create_unique_tree_id()

create_unique_tree_id for each individual tree over different years

from_access_to_forresdat()

copy table(s) from access database to git repository forresdat

from_forresdat_to_access()

copy table(s) from git repository forresdat to access database

give_diamclass_5cm()

Calculate the diameter class of diameter measure data

load_data_deadwood()

retrieves data on logs from Fieldmap database

load_data_dendrometry()

retrieve dendrometry data from Fieldmap database

load_data_herblayer()

retrieve species specific vegetation data from Fieldmap database

load_data_regeneration()

retrieve regeneration data from Fieldmap database

load_data_shoots()

retrieve data on shoots from Fieldmap database

load_data_vegetation()

retrieve vegetation data from Fieldmap database

load_height_models()

retrieve height model data from git repository forresheights

load_plotinfo()

retrieve generic plot data from Fieldmap database

make_table_wide()

change dataframe from long to wide format

read_forresdat()

load data package from git repository forresdat

read_forresdat_table()

load tables from git repository forresdat

remove_last_commit_forresdat()

remove last local change from git repository forresdat

remove_table_forresdat()

remove table(s) from data package forresdat

save_results_access()

save results of calculations in Access database

save_results_csv()

save results of calculations as .csv-files

save_results_forresdat()

save results of calculations in git repository forresdat
